divs: Sighting DetailsOk I had received a mini dv cam for christmas last year and i wanted to practice shooting video so i decided to go outside and shoot the Airplanes going by. i pointed the Camera up to capture a plane and thats when i saw this black object.it looked very unatural, my girlfriend was outside with me and she watched it with me. i tried to do the best i could at filming it but this was like the 3rd or 4th time i had ever used my camera.i filmed it until i couldnt see it anymore, it made no sound.and it seemed to come from out of no where.it kept changing shape and it was black on the outside with a bright light in the middle.
Summary: Ufo hovers over my house for about 5 seconds and then slowly rises up
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Oakland Park
There were no other sightings in Oakland Park on or around October 1st 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
